lead_paragraph: The Kootenai Indians will present a plan to the government to restore the Selkirk caribou near the border of the United States and Canada.

headline.main: Tribe Takes Lead in Saving Reindeer Herd in Rocky Mountains
headline.print_headline: Tribe Takes Lead in Saving Reindeer Herd

snippet: The Kootenai Indians will present a plan to the government to restore the Selkirk caribou near the border of the United States and Canada.
